prompts.title: Social Media Campaign Strategy
prompts.content:
Create a comprehensive social media campaign strategy for {{brand}} focusing on {{objective}}. Include:

1. Campaign Goals:
- Primary objectives
- Key performance indicators (KPIs)
- Target metrics

2. Target Audience Analysis:
- Demographics
- Interests
- Online behavior patterns

3. Platform Strategy:
- Platform selection rationale
- Platform-specific content approach
- Posting schedule

4. Content Plan:
- Content themes
- Content types
- Content calendar

5. Engagement Strategy:
- Community management approach
- Response guidelines
- Hashtag strategy

6. Budget Allocation:
- Paid promotion strategy
- Resource allocation
- ROI targets

Brand Voice: {{brandVoice}}
Campaign Duration: {{duration}}
prompts.description: Generate detailed social media campaign strategies with clear objectives and actionable plans

prompts.title: Viral Content Creator
prompts.content:
Create viral-worthy content for {{platform}} that will engage and inspire sharing. Include:

1. Hook:
- Attention-grabbing opening
- Emotional trigger points
- Curiosity elements

2. Content Structure:
- Story arc
- Key message
- Call-to-action

3. Viral Elements:
- Shareability factors
- Trending topics integration
- Engagement hooks

Target Emotion: {{emotion}}
Content Type: {{contentType}}
Trending Topic: {{trendingTopic}}
prompts.description: Generate viral-worthy content optimized for maximum social media engagement and sharing

prompts.title: Social Media Crisis Response
prompts.content:
Generate a crisis response strategy for {{situation}} on social media platforms. Include:

1. Initial Response:
- Acknowledgment statement
- Immediate actions
- Stakeholder communication

2. Communication Plan:
- Message points
- Platform-specific responses
- Timing strategy

3. Recovery Strategy:
- Follow-up communications
- Brand reputation management
- Community rebuilding

Tone: {{tone}}
Urgency Level: {{urgencyLevel}}
Stakeholders: {{stakeholders}}
prompts.description: Create professional crisis response strategies for social media incidents

prompts.title: How to Stay Productive

With **{{productName}}**, you can boost your productivity instantly.
#Productivity #Focus #TimeManagement
prompts.description: Create engaging Twitter thread about productivity tips and strategies

prompts.content:

**{{productName}}** helps you make healthier choices easier.
#HealthTips #Wellness #HealthyLiving

prompts.title: How to Start Your Business
prompts.content:

1/ Identify your niche: Focus on a specific market.
2/ Build a solid plan: Outline your strategy and goals.
3/ Secure funding: Explore options like loans or investors.
4/ Create a website: Establish your online presence.
5/ Market your business: Get the word out.

With **{{productName}}**, you can easily launch your business.
#Entrepreneurship #BusinessTips #Startup

prompts.title: How to Improve Your Time Management
prompts.content:

1/ Prioritize tasks: Focus on the most important.

5/ Use productivity tools: Stay organized.

**{{productName}}** makes time management effortless.
#TimeManagement #Productivity #Efficiency
prompts.description: Create engaging Twitter thread about time management tips and strategies

prompts.title: The Secret to a Successful Morning

5/ Plan your day: Know what you need to accomplish.

With **{{productName}}**, mornings are better.
#MorningRoutine #Success #Productivity
prompts.description: Create engaging Twitter thread about morning routine tips and strategies
